text: Yara kuphara kare o allahara pathe badha srsti kare ebam se'i masajide harama theke badha deya, yake ami prastuta karechi sthaniya o bahiragata sakala manusera jan'ye samabhabe ebam ye masajide harame an'yayabhabe kona dharmadrohi kaja karara icacha kare, ami taderake yantranadayaka sasti asbadana karaba.
